original_text: For seven days the people must give burnt offerings to the Lord. On the seventh day they must stop work and they must worship the Lord.’
korean_text: 너희는 이레 동안 여호와께 화제를 드릴 것이요 일곱째 날에도 성회로 모이고 아무 노동도 하지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: For seven days the people must give burnt offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 이레 동안 백성은 번제물을 바쳐야 하며

sentences.original_text: On the seventh day they must stop work
and they must worship the Lord
